comment.author: 38014680@N08
comment._content:
11/28/1904, d. 09/12/1951, US Marine Corps, COLONEL,
Died in crash of United Stratocruiser in SF Bay in Sept 1951, buried in Golden Gate National Cemetery.  He was a Marine Major in the South Pacific Combat Air Transport in WW2 (SCAT), and was there during the Battle of Guadalcanal.
